metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8862 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
mustache package before 2.2.1 for Node.js allows remote attackers toconduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks by leveraging a template with anattribute that is not quoted.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8862` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-mustache - 2.3.0-2
node-mustache - 2.3.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mustache.js package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-2').
